conditionsPopup.title: Ordinary Leave Conditions
conditionsPopup.description: Learn the conditions for applying for ordinary annual leave.
rules: This leave is granted annually upon request and requires prior approval.
If the employee is over 50 years old, they are entitled to <1>45 days</1> of leave.
If the employee is under 50 and has worked for <1>more than 10 years</1>, they are entitled to <1>30 days</1>.
If the employee is under 50 and has worked for <1>less than 10 years</1>, they are entitled to <1>21 days</1>.
